title: Linux mtype Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux mtype command, its options, and practical examples to enhance your understanding of basic file and directory operations.

meta.title: Linux mtype Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux mtype command, its options, and practical examples to enhance your understanding of basic file and directory operations.
meta.keywords: Linux, mtype command, file operations, directory operations, command-line, file management

verify.name: Verify mtype command version
verify.hint: The mtype command should be part of the GNU sharutils package. Please check the version information and ensure it matches the expected output.

verify.name: Verify mtype command options
verify.hint: The mtype command should display the available options when the --help flag is used. Please check the output and ensure it matches the expected format.

steps.title: Practical Examples of mtype Command Usage

verify.name: Verify mtype command usage for non-ASCII file
verify.hint: The mtype command should be able to properly display the contents of the non-ASCII file. Please check the output and ensure it includes the expected Japanese characters.

verify.name: Verify mtype command usage for binary file
verify.hint: The mtype command should be able to display the contents of the binary file in a readable format. Please check the output and ensure it includes the expected hex dump.
